医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
综合研究显示，膳食钠摄入量显着影响血压JAMA 研究发现，不同亚组（包括服用抗高血压药物的亚组）个体血压对饮食钠变化的反应是一致的，这表明钠摄入量对不同人群的血压存在普遍影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/Dietary-sodium-intake-significantly-impacts-blood-Pressure-reveals-compressive-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/Dietary-sodium-intake-significantly-impacts-blood-Pressure-reveals-compressive-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf61417b-4e23-4108-8f6e-8f35ff15f1a4 Tue, 14 Nov 2023 17:54:00 -0500 Dietary sodium intake significantly impacts blood pressure, reveals comprehensive study
研究表明，针对 A 型链球菌的新型疫苗可大幅减少治疗喉咙痛的抗生素使用量研究预测，针对 A 族链球菌 (Strep A) 的疫苗可以显着减少治疗喉咙痛的抗生素处方，从而可能导致全球针对这种疾病的抗生素使用量减少 33%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/New-vaccine-against-Strep-A-could-drastically-cut-antibiotic-use-for-sore-throats-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/New-vaccine-against-Strep-A-could-drastically-cut-antibiotic-use-for-sore-throats-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2193ee2a-d7b4-4679-9f1e-041bdff6a07f Tue, 14 Nov 2023 17:44:00 -0500 New vaccine against Strep A could drastically cut antibiotic use for sore throats, study suggests
经常喝咖啡可能有助于预防肠易激综合症研究表明，根据全球研究的系统回顾和荟萃分析确定，喝咖啡可以降低患肠易激综合症（IBS）的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/Drinking-coffee-regularly-may-help-prevent-irritable-bowel-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/Drinking-coffee-regularly-may-help-prevent-irritable-bowel-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5d03891-c7b8-47af-acae-e9c91683c83e Tue, 14 Nov 2023 17:31:00 -0500 Drinking coffee regularly may help prevent irritable bowel syndrome
使用大麻会影响青光眼的风险吗？新研究调查《科学报告》中的研究发现大麻使用与原发性开角型青光眼风险之间没有显着关联，挑战了大麻可能影响眼压和青光眼风险的观点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/Does-cannabis-use-impact-the-risk-of-glaucoma-New-study-investigates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/Does-cannabis-use-impact-the-risk-of-glaucoma-New-study-investigates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee1e6273-a5e9-4506-945c-d773001b2f70 Tue, 14 Nov 2023 17:23:00 -0500 Does cannabis use impact the risk of glaucoma? New study investigates
研究使用纤维素片绘制人体细胞外囊泡图，解锁疾病见解研究表明，使用纤维素纳米纤维片对细胞外囊泡进行空间分析，揭示它们在人体内的地理异质性，这可以促进对疾病的理解和治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/Study-uses-纤维素-sheets-to-map-bodys-extracellular-vesicles-unlocking-disease-insights.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/Study-uses-纤维素-sheets-to-map-bodys-extracellular-vesicles-unlocking-disease-insights.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=11ed46db-9b3a-418d-8663-f96c97186d1f Tue, 14 Nov 2023 17:12:00 -0500 Study uses cellulose sheets to map body's extracellular vesicles, unlocking disease insights
印第安纳大学研究人员获得 500 万美元拨款，用于改善对阿片类药物使用障碍青少年的护理得益于美国国立卫生研究院 Helping to End 的 500 万美元新拨款，印第安纳大学医学院的研究人员正在采取措施，改善患有阿片类药物使用障碍 (OUD) 和其他物质使用障碍 (SUD) 的青少年的护理可及性和质量成瘾长期（治愈）计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/IU-researchers-receive-245-million-grant-to-improve-care-for-adolescents-with-opioid-use-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/IU-researchers-receive-245-million-grant-to-improve-care-for-adolescents-with-opioid-use-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aac0b41d-7e7c-4db2-ad40-13644c107897 Tue, 14 Nov 2023 14:53:54 -0500 IU researchers receive $5 million grant to improve care for adolescents with opioid use disorder
对健康的自我认知影响患有关节炎的老年人的身体活动水平特殊外科医院 (HSS) 和威尔康奈尔医学院的研究人员进行的一项新研究表明，患有关节炎的人对自己的衰老过程有更多的负面感受，他们往往会减少体力活动，并认为自己不太健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/Self-perception-of-health-influences-physical-activity-levels-in-older-adults-with-arthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/Self-perception-of-health-influences-physical-activity-levels-in-older-adults-with-arthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a6a3d50a-f62b-46d5-9de9-97e5df41c8e1 Tue, 14 Nov 2023 11:36:26 -0500 Self-perception of health influences physical activity levels in older adults with arthritis
发现母胎沟通的新机制芬兰奥卢大学的一个研究小组表明，羊水中存在源自母体肠道细菌的纳米颗粒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/Novel-mechanism-of-maternal-fetal-communication-discovered.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/Novel-mechanism-of-maternal-fetal-communication-discovered.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a9d21a6-ac84-4e50-a610-cdec90c44902 Tue, 14 Nov 2023 11:33:58 -0500 Novel mechanism of maternal-fetal communication discovered
十小时内进食对健康有益英国最大的同类社区科学研究的新结果显示，在十小时内进食与更高的能量和情绪以及更低的饥饿水平有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/Eating-in-a-ten-hour-window-has-positive-health-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/Eating-in-a-ten-hour-window-has-positive-health-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21d7b8f3-5fe0-4ad7-a6b1-a84ca4181d84 Tue, 14 Nov 2023 11:03:02 -0500 Eating in a ten-hour window has positive health benefits
癌症干细胞诱导巨噬细胞衰老，为肿瘤形成创造条件癌症干细胞导致免疫系统健康的小鼠巨噬细胞老化，为肿瘤的形成创造条件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/Cancer-stem-cells-induce-macrophage-aging-creating-conditions-for-tumor-formation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/Cancer-stem-cells-induce-macrophage-aging-creating-conditions-for-tumor-formation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7bc03367-72cb-4c1c-80bd-20d7e979558f Tue, 14 Nov 2023 10:05:54 -0500 Cancer stem cells induce macrophage aging, creating conditions for tumor formation
